How to hide Apache version number in ubu: i'd presume like in any other install, change the variable in the apache config
see if there's a 'ServerTokens' value in the httpd.conf/apache2.conf/whatever ubuntu calls it and set it
config usually in the dir /etc/apache(2) or /etc/httpd, just use something like 'grep -inr servertokens /etc/apache2' for example
